articles.description: Aston Villa gave Liverpool a scare in their midweek Premier League clash by taking the lead at Villa Park inside three minutes before Joel Matip equalised for the visitors
articles.content:
Premier League pundit Gary Neville believes that Liverpool overcame a 'big' obstacle in Aston Villa after winning at Villa Park to keep pace with Manchester City in the Premier League title race.
Do… [+1198 chars]

articles.author: Lance Pugmire, USA TODAY
articles.title: 'The dumbest move in boxing history': Oscar De La Hoya blasts Eddie Hearn over Canelo Alvarez's loss - USA TODAY
articles.description: Oscar De La Hoya, who scripted so much of Canelo Alvarez's career, lashed out at replacement promoter Eddie Hearn for "not knowing boxing.”
articles.content: Having directed so much of Canelo Alvarez’s career, from Mexican television through multiple boxing world titles, Oscar De La Hoya feels equipped to comment on his upset loss last week to light-heavy… [+6815 chars]

articles.author: Jack Gaughan
articles.title: Pep Guardiola TEARS INTO Patrice Evra and Dimitar Berbatov for questioning his ability - Daily Mail
articles.description: Both Patrice Evra and Dimitar Berbatov featured for Man United in their chastening defeat in 2009, while the former also came out second best in the same clash in the 2011 final.
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola hit out at criticism of his management and said Manchester City's response to the dramatic defeat by Real Madrid is proof the squad possess character.
